column8: So famous and loved is Sherlock Holmes, who was based on Dr. Joseph Bell, Conan Doyle's tutor at Edinburgh University, that there are many people today who are quite unaware that he is fictional. In the fashion of William of Occam's 'Razor' theory, Holmes cuts down on nonsense and gets straight to the truth, as expressed in this legendary quote.
column21: Sherlock Holmes, the greatest of all detectives, fictional or otherwise, featured on our t-shirt with his greaest quote...
